body.name: BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster Oven, Even Toast Technology, Fits a 9" Pizza, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 25 mins
features: EvenToast Technology - The toaster oven interior is specially designed for even toasting of up to 4 slices of bread at a time
9” Pizza, 4 Slices of Bread - The compact toaster oven fits nicely on the countertop, while the curved interior makes room for 9” pizzas and 4 slices of bread.
Four Functions - The stainless steel/black toaster oven’s cooking functions include: baking, broiling, toasting, and keeping food warm.
30-Minute Timer - The timer includes precise toast settings and stay-on functionality.
Removable Crumb Tray - Keep the toaster oven clean with the convenient removable crumb tray.
body.description: Large enough for a 9” pizza or four slices of bread, the BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Stainless Steel Toaster Oven with Broiler Pan complements any kitchen countertop. This compact, versatile toaster oven bakes, broils, toasts, and keeps food warm, at up to 450°F. It comes with a baking and broiler pan that fits perfectly into the small toaster oven interior. Plus, our exclusive EvenToast Technology optimizes heat distribution to toast bread evenly. When it’s time to eat, trust the #1 brand in toaster ovens*—BLACK+DECKER. Large viewing window keep an eye on food during cooking. The durable glass window gives you a clear view of food throughout the cooking process. Bake/broiler pan don’t worry about finding pans to fit in the oven. The included baking/broiling pan fits perfectly, making it easy to insert and remove food. Toasting rack also included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect if you need a smaller size
reviews.reviewText: I don't use a toaster oven all that often so I wanted one that would fit in a cabinet and not take up a ridiculous amount of counter space - this is the PERFECT size. So far it has been very reliable as well.(i) The different functions have been great - The BROIL has been great if I'm using my oven for a main dish but need to broil a few sides or finish other dishes. BAKE takes a while to heat up but a lot faster our main kitchen oven when making a small snack for the kids. TOAST is what it says but the timer settings don't line up if you are a doing something frozen compared to a room temp item... not a big deal though.(ii) The trays are not but not sure I notice a huge difference when not using the crumb tray compared to when I do - especially if you preheat.(iii) the one tiny flaw is the design of the door. It doesn't actually open to 90 degrees or more (see my side angle picture) Not a huge deal but when things are hot it makes taking the tray our a little tricky because you almost have to life up a bit which can cause your item to slide on the rack or spill.The key feature for us were the dimensions of the unit - thankfully it has been a great toaster as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice and works well
reviews.reviewText: Replacing my old two slice toaster was a good move. This toaster oven features bake and broil and of course toast! It does the job. Takes a tray and toasts 4 slices at a time. Control knobs gives it multi function. Glass door opens all the way and easy to take food in and out. Just a little larger than the old toaster so I didn’t lose space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The nicest toaster oven that will actually fit into a cabinet garage with a door
reviews.reviewText: I have a cabinet with a built in toaster oven garage with a door that is exactly 11 inches in depth. While there are nicer and more high tech toaster ovens I would have liked to look at, this is actually one of maybe only 3 sold by any manufacturer that will fit. I got it to replace a Black and Decker model from the early 90s that had the toaster button with a darkness knob that was very intuitive. The world has moved on and now all toaster ovens use the controls this one does where you set which elements the heat will come from (top/bottom/both), how much power to apply, and a timer knob. When you set the knob you can actually hear it ticking down, and a loud "ding" goes off when it is done. As other have noted, it is a bit of an art to remember exactly where to set the knob - you also do not have to set the knob to 10 and then turn back to the left, but you do have to turn it past the mark with the half cooked toast slice or it won't ever stop counting down. Probably most inconvenient thing is that you have to remember to reset both of the upper knobs to "Toast" setting if you use it for any other purpose. Cleaning is a matter of removing a tray at the bottom, my previous one had a more convenient trap door that opened the entire bottom. But overall it seems high quality, safe, looks nice, and is a good replacement what I had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works really well for toast or grilled cheese Can even bake mac and cheese

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes toast so fast
reviews.reviewText: You better be ready to eat when you put your bread in the toaster oven. It's very fast and toasts evenly. Great improvement

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best, but it works.
reviews.reviewText: It makes an annoying clicking sound as it turns the heating element on and off. The temperature is about 25 degrees lower than the dial indicates. It could use a few more marks to indicate time setting, but you can figure it out.Good thing is that it fits in a compact space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not as good as previous Toaster it replaced.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace a previous one where the lower warmer had died. Needed this model because we have limited counter space between our refrigerator and stove. Usually a new model will be improved, but not in this case. Dials much harder to read, turn and set. Needed a flashlight to read them at first. Has 3 settings for toast. None of them are accurate Hard to find the "start" or "set" position on dials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy construction & toasts bread to perfection!
reviews.reviewText: I've only had this product for a short while, so I can't provide a definitive assessment of its longevity just yet. However, I can confidently say that in the time I've been using it, it has demonstrated remarkable durability and performance. It boasts a sturdy construction that suggests it will stand the test of time. When it comes to toasting bread, it achieves perfection with ease, ensuring that every slice comes out just the way you like it – perfectly golden brown and crispy. Moreover, it excels at melting cheese on bread, effortlessly transforming your ordinary sandwiches into gooey, mouthwatering delights. As I continue to put this appliance to the test, I look forward to experiencing its enduring reliability and continued ability to produce culinary perfection.
